thread.title: BBC Breakfast Presenter Muddles Up Daniel Craig And Craig David During ‘Spectre' Segment
thread.title_full: BBC Breakfast Presenter Muddles Up Daniel Craig And Craig David During ‘Spectre' Segment

author: Rachel McGrath
title: BBC Breakfast Presenter Muddles Up Daniel Craig And Craig David During ‘Spectre' Segment
text:
BBC Breakfast Presenter Muddles Up Daniel Craig And Craig David During ‘Spectre' Segment The Huffington Post UK | By Rachel McGrath 
We’ve all been there haven’t we, one minute you’re listening to ‘Fill Me In’ before starting work, then before you know it, you’ve accidentally referred to James Bond as Craig David , live on air. 
Huh? You haven’t? Well it’s exactly what happened to BBC Breakfast presenter Naga Munchetty. 
The host was midway through a segment about the ‘Spectre’ film, when for no apparent reason, she said the ‘7 Days’ hitmaker’s name instead of Daniel Craig ’s. Whoopsie. Craig David is James Bond! Lol. #bbcbreakfast pic.twitter.com/JVHAFJ0rnN 
— Ben Grafton (@BenGrafton) October 22, 2015 
Ah, the simple things that are always the funniest, dontcha think? 
Naga’s slip-up has got us thinking though, and while Craig is currently busy staging a comeback to end all comebacks, we reckon he’d make a dashing 007. 
Bond enjoys some downtime before fighting baddies or doing whatever it is he does 
Ever the professional, Naga quickly moved on following her mistake and managed to make it through the rest of the interview unscathed, before presumably returning to her dressing room and playing 'Rendezvous'. 
Of course, Naga isn't the first presenter to make a live on TV, and Bill Turnbull made a rather huge mistake earlier this year, when he accidentally dropped the C-bomb . Close
